title: What do the Hextech chests mean when you hover over a champion?
body:
Quick question, when you hover over a champion in your summoner profile, what is the difference between a greyed out chest and a gold chest? 
http://s32.postimg.org/bxop03p8l/Untitled.png
In the case of this image can i only earn chests using Master Yi?

replies.body: that doesnt matter. just look at the champion frame. master yi has a different one from everyone else cos you've earned a chest with him and now you cant for the rest of the season, with him. you dont need to hover to check that
yeah, i didn't actually know what the frame meant either. He is the only one i have earned a chest from.
gold means you have unlocked a chest on this champion and you wont be able to again greyed out means you can get one on this champion
